title: Graphic Design
description: Explore the essential principles of graphic design, including color theory, typography, and layout. This course is ideal for aspiring designers looking to create visually appealing graphics for personal or professional projects.

title: Publishing E-Books
description: Learn how to publish and sell your e-books on Selar. This course covers everything from formatting and uploading your content to marketing strategies for maximizing your sales.
